# R

This chapter is an overview of the methods that
we propose to solve an **important problem**.

## Read NetCDF

```{r}
library(ncdf4)
nc <- ncdf4::nc_open("data/OUT_EVAP_monthly_1971.nc")
slice <- ncdf4::ncvar_get(nc, 'OUT_EVAP', start = c(1,1,1), count = c(-1,-1,1))
image(slice)
```
